childrenYtVideo.title: React Hooks - useState and useEffect - Frontend Topics
childrenYtVideo.description:
After react's conf we're all pretty excited with the hooks API. Today we're going to see how to use the most basic ones, useState & useEffect. 

Can we finally get rid of classes ? What do you think ? 

Docs: https://reactjs.org/docs/hooks-intro.html

Sophie & Dan video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=V-QO-KO90iQ

childrenYtVideo.title: React Custom Hooks - Frontend Topics
childrenYtVideo.description:
Building your own Hooks lets you extract component logic into reusable functions. The idea of this video, is to show how powerful custom hooks are, creating an usePagination hook.

Hooks lessons code: https://github.com/alancampora/frontend-topics-hooks

React docs: https://reactjs.org/docs/hooks-custom.html
